Address: 508 WEST WALL SUITE 800, MIDLAND, Texas, 79701, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Dawson Geophysical Company, a Texas corporation (the "Company"), is a leading provider of North American onshore seismic data acquisition services with operations throughout the continental United States ("U.S.") and Canada. We acquire and process 2­D, 3­D and multi­component seismic data for our clients, ranging from major oil and gas companies to independent oil and gas operators as well as providers of multi­client data libraries. Our principal business office is located at 508 West Wall, Suite 800, Midland, Texas 79701 (Telephone: 432­684­3000), and our internet address is www.dawson3d.com. We make available free of charge on our website our annual reports on Form 10­K, quarterly reports on Form 10­Q, and current reports on Form 8­K as soon as reasonably practicable after filing or furnishing such information with the Securities and Exchange Commission ("SEC").
